text: Aluminium-conductor steel-reinforced (ACSR) cable is a type of high-capacity conductor widely used in overhead power lines. It combines the light weight and high conductivity of aluminium with the high tensile strength of steel, making it ideal for long-distance electricity transmission where durability and efficiency are crucial.https://web.archive.org/web/20171215053135/http://www.rmjtcable.com/d/file/manual/Aluminium_Electrical_Conductor_Handbook.pdf ==References== Category:Physics Category:Engineering Category:Electrical wiring Category:Infrastructure
title: Aluminium-conductor steel-reinforced cable
